PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
-Double wall vacuum insulated wine cooler keep your beverages at the desired temperature.
-Condensation-free.

- Double wall vacuum insulated mini ice pail, keep your ice frozen longer.         
- Use this as an ice bucket for drinks or keep your beverage bottle cold.                    
- With ice tongs.                                            
- With the wooden lid that can be used as a small tray for dried fruits or cheese.

- Double wall insulated stainless "sake" bottle keeps your liquors at the desired temperature longer.                                    
- 300ml capacity for the sake vessel and 0.04L for each sake cup.
HEAT / COLD RETENTION:
- Hot Retention (1HRS) : Above 63° C 
- Cold Retention (1HRS) : Below 7°C"

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
- Double wall vacuum insulated beer tumber keeps your beer cold and condensation-free.                                       
- Perfect size 420ml to enjoy your beer at home.                                                
- Keep your highball or Sawa delicious for hours.
HEAT / COLD RETENTION:
- Hot Retention (1HRS) : Above 48° C 
- Cold Retention (1HRS) : Below 8°C

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION / USP:
- Double wall insulated stainless cup keeps your beverage in the ceramic cup at the desired temperature longer.           
- Microwave oven OK! Use microwave to heat your liquors in the ceramic cup.
